name: Infinaeon
description: Infinaeon: The Infinitely Smarter Blockchain. The new iteration of Defi is here. Changing the way we view blockchains forever. Infinaeon is an innovative Layer 2 blockchain built on Ethereum, utilizing Ethereum as its native gas currency, similar to Base and Arbitrum. This cutting-edge platform introduces a unique mechanism that sets it apart from other chains: a dynamic allocation of gas fees to a smart contract for multiple purposes. The most important being the underlying asset of the chain will always appreciate in value.
